name: Team Rocket: The Heist
description:
Goal :
Steal as much pokeballs as possible before the turn counter runs out.
Avoid being shot by police officers.

How to play :
Use the arrow keys to move.
After 6 turns, you aromatically switch to another character.
Each character has specific abilities :
-Bonnie cannot be seen by enemies
-Clyde can kill enemies (arrow keys towards enemies)
-Doc can steal pokeballs from their glass cases (arrow keys towards pokeball)

(Created for DES201 Gameplay and Narrative Design)
Code and art by Luc
Character design by Martin
Original idea by James, Martin, Molly, Luc, Rory and Stuart
